title: Relative maximum from first derivative graph

content.question: The graph of the derivative of a function f is shown in the figure above. The graph has horizontal tangent lines at x = −1, x = 1, and x = 3 . At which of the following values of x does f have a relative maximum?

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
